Text: The video quality is good, and the Italian (at least, I'm assuming ITA means Italian) audio track runs fine, but the English audio track is about 45 seconds behind. I tried playing it in two different programs, muting one and letting the other run ahead, but different programs run videos in slightly different speeds; it's just impossible to sync up. If you're an Italian speaker, have at it. If you want it in English though, it's completely unwatchable :(

All Herc TV movies here , good quality and english :)
